quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Aretha Franklin and Demi Moore
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, condition. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A beauty product

questions.question: What musical instrument did Aretha Franklin learn to play by herself when she was a child?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Piano

questions.question: What is the name of Demi Moores first-born daughter?

questions.question: What objects is Demi Moore known for collecting?

options.text: She couldnt move her left hand.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She was cross-eyed.

questions.question: Who collaborated with Aretha Franklin on the 1987 single I Knew You Were Waiting (For Me)?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George Michael

questions.question: What is the song that launched Aretha Franklin into the top of the charts in 1967?

options.text: I Never Loved a Man (The Way I Love You)

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: I Never Loved a Man (The Way I Love You)

questions.question: What actress and friend of Demi Moore talked her into leaving school and taking up acting when she was sixteen?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rolling Stone

questions.question: President George W. Bush presented Aretha Franklin with this award on November 9, 2005.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Medal of Freedom

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ninotchka

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bill Clinton

questions.question: What line delivered by Greta Garbo in the 1932 movie Grand Hotel became very famous and has often been quoted in reference to her real life?

options.text: No man is good enough for me.
Nothing in this world can make fall in love with a man like you.
